data.title: Writers Guild Editing Entry Test
data.description: To edit Medium/Mirror articles, newsletter pieces, and client services work, you'll need to show your skills in a short editing test. Click this google docs link to find the instructions and the test: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HSZac2yN3DHb3Usia63Ws1gFRiURebXoy2GmXJtycmw/edit#heading=h.cdqxgdwsrbx6 When you're done, DM @ samanthaj with your document! Good luck, and reach out to @ samanthaj with any questions.
data.criteria: One google doc with comments and suggestions

data.title: Editors Test
data.description: Editors Test to begin editing work for the writers guild
data.criteria: Make detailed content and grammar edits

data.title: Editors Test
data.description: Take the editing test
data.criteria: Send completed doc to <@!868995135810179112>

data.title: Find the best colors for bounty status labels
data.description:
The bounty board is getting a redesign, and as part of that we're looking for the perfect colors for the bounty status labels (eg - Open, In-Progress). 

Bounty submission should include hex codes for all 6 statuses - Open, In-Progress, In-Review, Completed, Draft, Deleted

Redesign preview - https://bounty-board-rb3ekk7jt-banklessdao.vercel.app/
data.criteria: Bounty submission should include hex codes for all 6 statuses - Open, In-Progress, In-Review, Completed, Draft, Deleted

data.title: Smart contract work
data.description: Develop smart contracts for CityDAO.
data.criteria: 2 Smart contracts deployed on l1.

data.title: Update Documentation
data.description: The developer documentation for the website project needs to TLC. Run through an Install of the project from scratch for different environments (if possible) and update the documentation that outlines how to get up and running so you can make contributions
data.criteria: A pull request reviewed and approved by @zberwaldt with the updated documentation.

data.title: ops call to action writing
data.description: Short call with AAJ to get details around this call to action post, then writing the appropriate post to save AAJ time
data.criteria: Post should be made within 2 hours of the call, call should be 15 min or so.

data.title: https://github.com/BanklessDAO/bankless-dao-ghost-website/issues/104
data.description: Create a nice CSS animation for the articles on the home page

data.title: Join Employment Commons
data.description: Opolis is a digital employment cooperative helping freelancers access high-quality group-rate benefits. Join as an Employee-Member to claim.
data.criteria:
1. Fill this out: https://opolis.typeform.com/banklessdao.
2. Complete onboarding to Employment Commons.
3. Run your payroll at least twice.

data.title: GitcoinDAOxBanklessDAO POAP Design
data.description: I'm working with Kevin from GitcoinDAO to survey full time employees across multiple DAOs to gather some data on how all of us are managing this new form of employment. As part of the survey, we'd like to distribute a POAP to those who fill out the survey
data.criteria: Use assets from https://gitcoin.co/press and BanklessDAO assets to create a "DAO Workers Survey" POAP

data.title: 4 DESIGNERS: Bed Index Campaign artworks
data.description: For the Gleam campaign for the Bed Index, we have to prepare some drawings with a surrealistic style, be it a drawing, an illustration, a 3D, a composition, the important thing is that it is very colorful. The 10-15 best designs, selected by Index Coop, will be awarded. The reward indicated is for each design, ask Grendel for more details. Deadline Aug 29
data.criteria: The Bed Index logo and the owl for Index Coop must appear (possibly also the DAO logo)

data.title: Take notes for Bankless Academy Devops Onboarding
data.description: Please take notes during the devops x Bankless Academy onboarding discussion. By the end of the discussion the bankless academy project should have what they need to deploy their application.
data.criteria: Notes should be stored in notion and link posted for all to see

data.title: Implement BB Components: Sort and Filter
data.description:
Need to implement the sort and filter components.
https://github.com/BanklessDAO/bounty-board/issues/35
data.criteria: Implement 2 components.

data.title: Design Guild Tag 'badge' image
data.description: 64x64 pixel image that acts as a badge next to user name in Discord for the design guild role tag holders
data.criteria: Unmistakably representative of design guild and easy to visually identify what it is at sizes as small as an emoji reaction https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/4409571023639-Custom-Role-Icons-FAQ#h_01FGN0D7PS28WY8H1KEFW5VBN0 (note: fight club is using these)

data.title: Role Tag 'badge' for Design Guild
data.description: A role icon image for dispaly next to a Discord user's name that has the @designguild role tag
data.criteria: File size less that 256kb with at least 64 x 64px images size.  Must look good at small resolutions (think display size of an emoji)

data.criteria: Deployed on Polygon.

data.title: SOS Website Bug - Fix connected wallet name
data.description: When a user's wallet is not an ENS, the connected wallet label displays as "null". Should display short hand wallet address.
data.criteria: An approved pull request to fix the bug to the wallet name being displayed on the site.

data.title: Copy Values in a Google Sheets Document

data.title: Articles for the Gleam Bed Index Campaign
data.description: Speaking with Index Coop it was highlighted the possibility of posting as BanklessDAO a short article on Mondays and Wednesdays about the Bed Index, for two weeks. The other days would be covered by Index Coop. We are therefore talking about 4 short articles, to be posted on Medium or Mirror
data.criteria: The subject of the article is the Bed Index and, if so, talk about the friendly relations between BanklessDAO and Index Coop. The reward indicated is for a single articole.

data.title: Create BB Loom and reach out to Guilds on training and usage
data.description: Create a Loom for the Bounty Board as a training tool, and reach out to Guilds to collect feedback on usage.
data.criteria: Loom, and Guild outreach.

data.title: Run local DEGEN Project

data.title: Create NFT artwork for ECH
data.description: So, I am writing something for Ethereum Cat Headers. They want to provide a NFT to every EIP(Ethereum Improvement Proposal) editor whose draft gets finalized. I need something with Ethereum and Ethereum Cat Hearders (https://ethereumcatherders.com/) logo on it . And I will need the raw file with layers so I can change the "EIP-<eip-number>" text on it.
data.criteria: A raw file of artwork for the NFT with layer so I can edit text

data.title: Get BANK logo on Trust Wallet
data.description: In order to get the BANK logo on DEXs like Uniswap, we need to onboard via Trust wallet (https://developer.trustwallet.com/add_new_asset)
data.criteria: BANK logo appears on Uniswap.Info

data.title: Degen POAP Tracking
data.description: To facilitate CC poap distribution, log all usernames that joined the CC during its scheduled time (plus 30m before).
data.criteria: A list of names sent to <@198981821147381760> after every CC.

data.title: Wireframes for First Quests Mobile App
data.description: A mobile app developer has started to think about creating a bankless mobile app! It would be a miss to not have new member onboarding as a part of that. We'll need to get the dev the initial architecture and wireframes for the work to begin.
data.criteria: Figma file with wireframes based on the current First Quests material, sync with Behold and Angyts on context before beginning work

data.title: DAO Dash CSS Design
data.description: DAO Dash team would like help with some custom CSS/HTML work to create a BanklessDAO branded skin for our new UI being developed in Apache Superset.
data.criteria: All CSS files/templates must be BanklessDAO and/or BanklessHQ colors and brand. The files must integrate and be compatible with Apache Superset.

data.title: 30 mins Knowledge Share for Conversion Rate Analysis for Marketing Campaigns
data.description: Looking for someone to provide a 30 mins presentation on the basics of Conversion Rate Analysis for Marketing Campaigns. Ideally, this presentation will include an explanation of the types of data used, where data is generally found, some helpful charts & visuals used. This knowledge might be useful for Bankless DAO marketing campaigns.
data.criteria: A 30 minute presentation with a slide deck

data.title: Knowledge Session Coverage
data.description:
zkSync is sending a representative to do a Q+A Session about zkSync and zk-Rollups for the BanklessDAO. I have coordinated much of this but need someone to be here to guide the rep around and do a high-quality screen recording for me. I will be traveling that day and have low confidence I can be there to attend.

You can talk to me zberwaldt, Fellow coordinator Steff, or ivan7538
data.criteria: MC the Knowledge Session. Introduce the Keynote/ Rep from zkSync. take a high quality screen recording for our records.

data.title: Refer New Members
data.description: You can claim this bounty by referring Employee Members to the Commons.
data.criteria: 1. Fill this out: https://opolis.typeform.com/banklessdao. 2. Referral onboards to Employment Commons. 3. Runs their payroll at least twice.

data.title: Create DEGEN Dev Docs
data.description: Codebase is easily accessible if you're an existing dev on the project, but needs clarity on workflow for those new to DEGEN development.
data.criteria: Create Wiki in the GitHub repo.

data.title: I NEED a fuckin' PA
data.description: To ensure I’m able to execute on my responsibilities and not lose track of little things that cone up, I would like to offer a personal assistant position to any qualified guest-pass holder. This position pays 5k BANK a month, with an expected workload of approximately 2 to 3 hours a week.
data.criteria: Competent execution on expected tasks and responsibilities.

data.title: "Level 2 Compensation Study Dashboard"
data.description: Use DAO Dash to perform an analysis of the compensation study performed to evaluate the Season 1 remuneration of Level 2 contributors across the DAO.  This bounty is championed by @FrogMonkee and has a deadline deliverable of 11/11/21.  Available to Analytics Guild tag holders.
data.criteria: Create a dashboard using DAO Dash that includes visual elements (charts, KPIs) etc that tells the story of the collected data.  These visuals will be presented in the 11/12/21 community call.

data.title: Setup bot NFT Sales on Olympus/Odyssey Discord Server
data.description: We need help to create and setup a bot to track sales and show the rarity of the Mushroms NFT's in a dedicated channel in the Olympus Odyssey discord server. ( https://opensea.io/collection/mushrohms )
data.criteria: The bot must be up and working

data.title: Notion API Analysis
data.description: Use notions APIs to retrieve data from the BanklessDAO notion pages. Summarize a data analysis of usage and present findings to DevOps team.
data.criteria: Demo to the DevOps Team

data.title: Smart contract develop
data.description: I need a smart contract developed!
data.criteria: Deployed on Polygon.

data.title: Front End Bounty Functionality
data.description:
Create the Front End Functionality to:
Draft, Create, Claim, Submit and Complete a Bounty.
data.criteria: Front end functionality of the above.

data.title: Bounty Board Outreach Proposal
data.description:
Initiation of the Bounty Board Outreach program defined by Links.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Z2E6zVC-Kk_AD7subscT_qsFIVA1usQ6wbB2RuDOCto/edit#
data.criteria:
Documented meetings with 1-3 members of the writer’s guild
Identification and documentation around high-value use cases
Implementation of partial solutions for the writer’s guild (hopefully regularly pushing BANK through the bounty board)
Spec for features based on the high-value use cases
A prioritization of features based on effort and potential BANK value

data.title: Bounty Board Outreach
data.description:
Speak with 1-3 members each of (design, marketing, translator’s) guild
    - Validate the inter-guild use cases discovered in writer’s guild interviews
    - Identify new uses cases for the bounty board within these 
    - Update the BB Use Cases Document
    - Work with BB devs to implement some of these use cases
External outreach: help CityDAO have success using the Bounty Board
    - Meet with them to understand their challenges and desires
    - Help them use current Bounty Board features to overcome challenges identified
    - Work with BB devs to implement features for further success
data.criteria: The above criteria.
